text: Margo Martindale (born July 18, 1951) is an Emmy Award winning American actress. She was born in Jacksonville, Texas. She has acted in many movies, stage plays and TV series. In 2011, She won the Emmy Award for "Outstanding Supporting Actress In A Drama Series" for her acting as Mags Bennett on the TV series Justified. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Texas Category:People from Jacksonville, Texas Category:Emmy Award winners Category:1951 births Category:Living people
title: Margo Martindale
